Defined class GenSetup with attribute(s) and method(s). Generate module file setup.py by template and parameters.
class dist_py_module.pro.GenSetup(verbose=False)[source]¶

Bases: ats_utilities.config_io.base_check.FileChecking

Defined class GenSetup with attribute(s) and method(s). Generate module file setup.py by template and parameters. It defines:

attributes:
__slots__ - Setting class slots.
VERBOSE - Console text indicator for current process-phase.
__PRO_STRUCTURE - Project setup (template, module).
__reader - Reader API.
__writer - Writer API.
__config - Project setup in dict format.
methods:
__init__ - Initial constructor.
get_reader - Getter for template reader.
get_writer - Getter for template writer.
gen_setup - Generate module file setup.py.
__str__ - Dunder method for GenSetup.
VERBOSE = 'DIST_PY_MODULE::PRO::GEN_SETUP'¶
